section.title: Configuration
section.para: The following configuration tools are required for a POC deployment:

Subscription Management Tool (SMT): Used for SUSE Linux Enterprise 12 SP4 to allow enterprise customers to optimize the management of SUSE Linux Enterprise software updates and subscription entitlements. SMT allows you to provision updates for all of your devices running a product based on SUSE Linux Enterprise.

SUSE Customer Center (SCC): Before you create a local mirror of the required repositories, you need appropriate organization credentials. You can obtain the credentials from SCC. To get the credentials from the SCC, visit the SUSE Customer Center at and log in.
